Name: Hatchetman
Details: The Hatchetman is a medium BattleMech weighing in at 45 tons. So named for the BattleMech hatchet affixed to its right arm. Despite first being manufactured in the Lyran Commonwealth in 3023, the Hatchetman was actually designed by Team Banzai commander Dr. B Banzai as part of a joint venture between the Federated Suns and the Lyran Commonwealth.
